summary: The module defines a set of abstract base classes and a registry that support the implementation and execution of security checks on Kubernetes resource manifests. It supplies shared logic for extracting container specifications, evaluating RBAC permissions, assessing rootâ€‘user settings, and validating configuration values, while the registry orchestrates scanning, invokes the appropriate checks, and tracks scan state.
business_intent: To provide a reusable framework that enables Checkov to perform consistent, automated static analysis of Kubernetes manifests for security compliance, reducing duplication across checks and ensuring accurate identification and reporting of policy violations.
